resources.string: The App is Processing you Data !
The Application is Analyzing your Internet Traffic and your Installed Apps

These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your use of the "NetWatch Pro" application ("App"), provided to you by the International Hellenic University ("University" or "we"). By installing, accessing, or using the App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use the App.
You must read, understand, and agree to these Terms before using the App. Your use of the App constitutes your acceptance of these Terms and your agreement to be bound by them.
NetWatch Pro is a mobile application designed to scan and analyze installed apps on your device for potential malware and to monitor internet traffic for suspicious IP packages.

a. Malware Scanning: You acknowledge that the App\'s malware scanning capabilities are based on available data and heuristics and may not guarantee the detection of all malware. You are responsible for keeping your device and its applications up-to-date and secure.

b. Internet Traffic Analysis: The App provides information about internet traffic on your device. You are solely responsible for interpreting and taking action based on this information. The App does not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the data it provides.
c. Privacy: The App may require access to certain device permissions and data to function properly. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your data.
a. Use the App for any unlawful or unauthorized purpose.
b. Attempt to disrupt or interfere with the proper functioning of the App.
c. Reverse engineer, decompile, or attempt to extract the source code of the App.

All intellectual property rights in the App, including but not limited to copyrights, trademarks, and trade secrets, are owned by the University. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any part of the App without our prior written consent.
The App is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. The University does not warrant that the App will be error-free or uninterrupted.

To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, the University shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, arising out of or related to your use or inability to use the App.

The University reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. It is your responsibility to review these Terms periodically. Your continued use of the App after changes to the Terms are made constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law principles.
If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms or the App, please contact us at info@ict.ihu.gr.
By using the "NetWatch Pro" App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please do not use the App.
